dialogues.speaker: BOSSP
dialogues.text: BOSS P: Agent Incognito, the city of Chicago has given us 24 hours to crack this case.

dialogues.speaker: BOSSP
dialogues.text: BOSS P: To aid you through this, I have sent Babemax as your personal assistant for this investigation. I’ve texted you his location.

dialogues.speaker: BOSSP
dialogues.text: BOSS P: Work closely and let nothing deter you from unveiling the truth.

interactive.speaker: BOSSP
interactive.prompt: BOSS P: What do you think?

choices.response: Got it, Boss! With Babemax, I’ll look into every detail. I’m ready to make a strategic plan to uncover the truth.
Understood, Boss. I’ll connect the dots of what’s unseen and pivot as new information comes to light.

dialogues.speaker: BOSSP
dialogues.text: BOSS P: That’s precisely what I like to hear.

interactive.speaker: BOSSP
interactive.prompt: BOSS P: Now, get cracking!

choices.response: Absolutely boss!

dialogues.speaker: BABEMAX
dialogues.text: BABEMAX: zzzzz... erm...

interactive.speaker: BABEMAX
interactive.prompt: BABEMAX: Oh hello Agent Incognito

choices.response: Why were you sleeping if you’re a robot...?
Cool, a sleeping robot! Nice to meet you Babemax.

dialogues.speaker: BABEMAX
dialogues.text: BABEMAX: Haha although I’m mostly automated, I feel sensations like hunger and fatigue. Gotta get my beauty sleep, y’know?

interactive.speaker: BABEMAX
interactive.prompt: BABEMAX: Anyways, which direction would you like to go with our investigation?

choices.response: [in progress] Identify potential culprits based on financial motives
Learn more about Lizzi’s personal relationships

dialogues.speaker: BABEMAX
dialogues.text: BABEMAX: Don’t worry, we were given permission to enter Lizzi’s house to find evidence.

interactive.speaker: BABEMAX
interactive.prompt: BABEMAX: Make a choice!

choices.response: Option 1
Option 2

dialogues.speaker: BABEMAX
dialogues.text: BABEMAX: That is Lizzi’s house down the road. We could ask around this neighborhood to find clues.

interactive.speaker: BABEMAX
interactive.prompt: BABEMAX: What do you say?

choices.response: We should look for her phone records.
[in progress] Let’s go talk to them directly. See what they have to say.

dialogues.speaker: BABEMAX
dialogues.text: BABEMAX: Hey Agent Incognito! I was able to extract some records from this phone Lizzi left behind.

interactive.speaker: BABEMAX
interactive.prompt: BABEMAX: Take a look at this call with her husband Cornelius.

choices.response: Let's see it.

dialogues.speaker: LIZZI
dialogues.text: LIZZI: Cornelius! When are you thinking of coming back? It’s already 1 am.

dialogues.speaker: CORNELIUS
dialogues.text: CORNELIUS: Sorry honey, didn’t see the time pass. I’ll head back now.

dialogues.speaker: LIZZI
dialogues.text: LIZZI: Good. I don’t know why you’re always out so late at night, but please-zz do let m– zz bzzttt zz-

dialogues.speaker: CORNELIUS
dialogues.text: CORNELIUS: Lizzi..? Hello, Lizzi?!

interactive.speaker: BABEMAX
interactive.prompt: BABEMAX: Oh there's one with her former boss Elon Tusk as well.

choices.response: Elon Tusk? Why was he calling her? Babemax, show me that.
Hmm... Interesting... Can you show me that?

dialogues.speaker: TUSK
dialogues.text: TUSK: Lizzi, how long do you plan to let Cornelius leech off of you?

dialogues.speaker: LIZZI
dialogues.text: LIZZI: Don’t talk like that about my husband! He deserves some rest from work.

dialogues.speaker: TUSK
dialogues.text: TUSK: Fine. But he’s been doing nothing for years now—he also doesn't treat you well. Don’t let him drag you down.

dialogues.speaker: LIZZI
dialogues.text: LIZZI: That’s for me to decide. And stop calling me outside work.

interactive.speaker: BABEMAX
interactive.prompt: BABEMAX: Beep. Beep. Incoming call from Boss P.

choices.response: I hope Boss P has good news for us!
Boss P... This must be important.

dialogues.speaker: BABEMAX
dialogues.text: BABEMAX: Let’s go chat with her acquaintances. See what they have to say.

interactive.speaker: BABEMAX
interactive.prompt: BABEMAX: Who should we talk to first?

choices.response: The lover is always the most suspicious. Let's talk to her husband Cornelius.
Based on what I've gathered, she had a rocky relationship with her former boss Elon Tusk. Let's talk to him.

dialogues.speaker: BABEMAX
dialogues.text: BABEMAX: Wassup Cornelius!

interactive.speaker: BABEMAX
interactive.prompt: BABEMAX: Beep. Beep. Incoming call from Boss P.

choices.response: I hope Boss P has good news for us!
Boss P... This must be important.

dialogues.speaker: BABEMAX
dialogues.text: BABEMAX: Wassup Tusk!

interactive.speaker: BABEMAX
interactive.prompt: BABEMAX: Beep. Beep. Urgent message from Boss P. We have to meet him ASAP

choices.response: I hope Boss P has good news for us!
Boss P... This must be important.

dialogues.speaker: BOSS P
dialogues.text: BOSSP: Agent Incognito and Agent Babemax, I have some new information to relay to you.

dialogues.speaker: BOSSP
dialogues.text: BOSS P: We just completed a forensics analysis and have tracked down the murderer’s identity. They are a high-ranking member of the underground assassin’s guild.

dialogues.speaker: BOSSP
dialogues.text: BOSS P: We also found that they were hired by Company X around the time Lizzi died.

dialogues.speaker: BABEMAX
dialogues.text: BABEMAX: Oh sus… Well Agent Incognito,

interactive.speaker: BABEMAX
interactive.prompt: BABEMAX: what do you think we should do next?

choices.response: Let’s infiltrate Company X undercover.
Let’s gather information from afar through cyber-breaching.

dialogues.speaker: BABEMAX
dialogues.text: BABEMAX: Hey check this out! I was able to decrypt this guarded file from Company X’s server and it seems to mention Lizzi along with another name… “Birb?” New name to me, wonder who she is.

interactive.speaker: BABEMAX
interactive.prompt: BABEMAX: Who do you want to approach and talk to further?

choices.response: Search the area and find Birb.
Investigate Elon Tusk further.

dialogues.speaker: BIRB
dialogues.text: BIRB: Oh goodness! Don’t sneak up on me like that.

interactive.speaker: BIRB
interactive.prompt: BIRB: Who are you and what do you want?

choices.response: Sorry, I didn't mean to surprise you. Just wanted to chat!
… (show detective badge)

dialogues.speaker: BIRB
dialogues.text: BIRB: Oh I recognize you from the news. Wait wait don’t hurt me, you’ve come to the right person to talk to.

dialogues.speaker: BIRB
dialogues.text: BIRB: If you’ve talked with Elon Tusk before, I’m sure he never brought this full story out:

dialogues.speaker: BIRB
dialogues.text: BIRB: back when Lizzi was still an employee at Company X, they were stealing her personal research on longevity pills as their own and didn’t give any credit to her.

dialogues.speaker: BIRB
dialogues.text: BIRB: In the end, she decided to leave with her research. It was sad to see her leave, as she was my research partner, but I thought that it was for the best.

dialogues.speaker: BIRB
dialogues.text: BIRB: That must’ve angered Tusk though.

interactive.speaker: BABEMAX
interactive.prompt: BABEMAX: Beep. Beep. Report to Boss P. It's time to decide

choices.response: Okay Babemax, take me to Boss P

dialogues.speaker: TUSK
dialogues.text: TUSK: Ah, I see you’ve come back to talk with me.

dialogues.speaker: TUSK
dialogues.text: TUSK: If it is to help with the murder case, I am more than willing to share.

dialogues.speaker: TUSK
dialogues.text: TUSK: Lizzi was an exemplary employee in our team, embodying hard work, loyalty, and an admirable openness to learn.

dialogues.speaker: TUSK
dialogues.text: TUSK: However, a disturbing shift occurred, seemingly influenced by her husband, Cornelius. Suddenly, she veered off course, compromising her integrity by misappropriating sensitive data concerning our groundbreaking technology—a clear breach of her contract.

dialogues.speaker: TUSK
dialogues.text: TUSK: From that point, Lizzi vanished from our circles and whispers of her transformation into someone unrecognizable began to surface. It’s my belief that Cornelius played a pivotal role in this debacle, steering her down this regrettable path.

interactive.speaker: BABEMAX
interactive.prompt: BABEMAX: Beep. Beep. Report to Boss P. It's time to decide

choices.response: Okay Babemax, take me to Boss P

dialogues.speaker: BIRB
dialogues.text: BIRB: Agent Incognito and Agent Babemax, the evidence you’ve meticulously gathered points to our key suspects. It’s time to make the call that will echo through the halls of justice in Chicago.

interactive.speaker: BABEMAX
interactive.prompt: BABEMAX: Who among them do you believe is the mastermind behind this murder?

choices.response: I believe it’s Birb
I believe it’s Cornelius
I believe it’s Elon Tusk

dialogues.speaker: BOSSP
dialogues.text: BOSS P: Your judgment has guided us thus far and will lead us to the conclusion of this case. Now, will you move to convict and close this chapter of our city’s story, or is there still a doubt in your heart that calls for a deeper search for absolute certainty?

dialogues.speaker: BOSSP
dialogues.text: BOSS P: Now, will you move to convict and close this chapter of our city’s story, or is there still a doubt in your heart that calls for a deeper search for absolute certainty?

interactive.speaker: BOSSP
interactive.prompt: BOSS P: The decision rests in your hands.

choices.response: I move to convict. Let’s bring justice to the city.
I still have reservations. I propose we investigate further before we make an irreversible decision.

dialogues.speaker: BIRB
dialogues.text: BIRB: Very well, Agent Incognito. Let’s bring this chapter to its truthful end, for the eyes of Chicago are upon us, trusting us to make the right call.

interactive.speaker: BABEMAX
interactive.prompt: BABEMAX: The suspect has been convicted. May the city live in peace and harmony.

choices.response: The end. Click to see your results

dialogues.speaker: BIRB
dialogues.text: Very well, Agent Incognito. Let’s bring this chapter to its truthful end, for the eyes of Chicago are upon us, trusting us to make the right call.

interactive.speaker: BABEMAX
interactive.prompt: No one was convicted... May the city live in peace and harmony.

choices.response: The end. Click to see your results
